channel.title: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me
channel.description:
After spending over an hour-and-a-half on what turned out to be eleven scrolls (I got two coordinate ones for the same place!) I got this
[img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/5109/49785779.png[/img]
:(

item.title: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

The Wanderer:

merching is great. Saw this thread of one guy making 29b off manipulating natures with two other friends (took 2 months). Was before free trade though.

I would, but I don’t trust myself or the economy enough

Read full topic
item.source: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me

item.title: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:13, topic:457315”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=560243.msg4090988#msg4090988 date=1346357499]
I don’t even know what armor piece that is. Those three teleportation scrolls are handy though. You might as well not even waste your time with Clue Scrolls. The odds of getting a 3rd age piece is like… 1 in 32,000?
[/quote]

Closer to one in 100,000 to 999,999.[/quote]

I wouldn’t be a bit surprised at all.

On Topic: When I played I made my Bank from Player V.S. Monster. I don’t have an answer to your questions in regards as to how to make Coin with those statistics.

Read full topic
item.source: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me

item.title: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me

item.source: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me

item.title: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:11, topic:457315”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=560243.msg4091131#msg4091131 date=1346374467]

Well don’t do medium clues Hard and Elites are generally the only ones worth doing if you aren’t going for god pages or ranger boots.

Alright

Also, I can afford a green mask now, but only just… should I buy?

If I were you I’d save up to buy an Easter Egg. They will always be gaining value.

Easter egg is only like half the price But why do they gain value when masks do not?

A mask can’t accidentally be eaten.

I see

http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Easter_egg/viewitem.ws?obj=1961
It’s dropping in price, though.

Rune-economics at work.
[/quote]


What do you suggest I do to make more money? I have enough to cover most costs.[/quote]

Phish 138’s under the guise of a RuneScape 3 Beta. I mean uhhh lol go fish!

Read full topic
item.source: I hate clue scrolls and cluescrolls hate me

Also, I can afford a green mask now, but only just… should I buy?

If I were you I’d save up to buy an Easter Egg. They will always be gaining value.

Easter egg is only like half the price But why do they gain value when masks do not?

A mask can’t accidentally be eaten.

I see

RuneScape

Easter egg - Grand Exchange - RuneScape

Happy Easter.


It’s dropping in price, though.
[/quote]

Rune-economics at work.[/quote]


What do you suggest I do to make more money? I have enough to cover most costs.

Read full topic
